title: It's me, Jorge
desc: Borges was right to end it where he did

panels.alt: A cowboy riding left to right, smoking. The sun is up and there are birds in the sky
panels.text: God moves the cowboy, and he, the horse. Which god behind God begets the plot of dust and time and dreams and agonies?

panels.alt: A cowboy riding right to left, smoking. The moon is up and there are stars in the sky
